<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
var delay=1000; 
function disableLedButtons()
{
    document.getElementById("LED1On").disabled = true;
    document.getElementById("LED1Off").disabled = true;
    document.getElementById("LED2On").disabled = true;
    document.getElementById("LED2Off").disabled = true;
}
function enableLedButtons()
{
    document.getElementById("LED1On").disabled = false;
    document.getElementById("LED1Off").disabled = false;
    document.getElementById("LED2On").disabled = false;
    document.getElementById("LED2Off").disabled = false;
}
function LED1On()
{
	disableLedButtons();
    dweetio.dweet_for(thingID, {led1Stat:"ON"});
    setTimeout(enableLedButtons,delay);   
};
function LED1Off()
{
    disableLedButtons();
	dweetio.dweet_for(thingID, {led1Stat:"OFF"});
    setTimeout(enableLedButtons,delay);   
}
function LED2On()
{
    disableLedButtons();
	dweetio.dweet_for(thingID, {led2Stat:"ON"});
    setTimeout(enableLedButtons,delay);   
}
function LED2Off()
{
    disableLedButtons();
	dweetio.dweet_for(thingID, {led2Stat:"OFF"});
    setTimeout(enableLedButtons,delay);   
}
</script>
<style>
button.ledOnButton{
    height:50px; 
    width:80px;
    background-color: #4CAF50; 
    border: none;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
button.ledOffButton{
    height:50px; 
    width:80px;
    background-color: #008CBA; 
    border: none;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
button:disabled {
    opacity: 0.6;
    background-color: #e7e7e7; 
    color: black;
    cursor: not-allowed;
}
</style>
<center>
    LED1 : <button id="LED1On" onclick="LED1On()"  class="ledOnButton" disabled>ON</button>  
    	   <button id="LED1Off" onclick="LED1Off()" class="ledOffButton" disabled>OFF</button><p/>
    LED2 : <button id="LED2On" onclick="LED2On()"  class="ledOnButton" disabled>ON</button>  
           <button id="LED2Off" onclick="LED2Off()" class="ledOffButton" disabled>OFF</button>
</center>
